content: AUTHORIZATION FOR SITE SECURITY PROGRAM. The Reclamation Safety of Dams Act of 1978 is amended to include site security measures for Bureau of Reclamation dams, including post-September 11, 2001 security activities and operation costs. The Reclamation Safety of Dams Act of 1978 is amended to include site security measures for Bureau of Reclamation dams, with a focus on safety of dams and site security costs allocated to irrigation and water service in the Central Valley Project of California. The Reclamation Safety of Dams Act of 1978 is amended to include site security measures for Bureau of Reclamation dams, with a focus on safety of dams and site security costs allocated to irrigation and water service in the Central Valley Project of California. The amendment includes modifications to operation and maintenance water rates, capital water rates, and reimbursement of operation and maintenance costs. The amendment to the Reclamation Safety of Dams Act of 1978 authorizes the Secretary to develop policies for agreements with project beneficiaries regarding reimbursable costs of site security activities. This includes modifications to operation and maintenance water rates and capital water rates for Bureau of Reclamation dams in the Central Valley Project of California. The amendment authorizes the Secretary to develop policies for agreements with project beneficiaries regarding reimbursable costs of site security activities. This includes modifications to water rates for Bureau of Reclamation dams in the Central Valley Project of California. Section 5 of the Reclamation Safety of Dams Act of 1978 is amended to authorize funds for post-September 11, 2001, building and site security activities. This includes modifications for structures based on new data or safety criteria changes. The Reclamation Safety of Dams Act of 1978 is amended to authorize funds for post-September 11, 2001, building and site security activities. The Secretary is required to report annually on security actions and expenditures, detailing costs pre and post-September 11, 2001. SEC. 3. OTHER REPORTING REQUIREMENTS. Amends Section 5A(c)(3) of the Reclamation Safety of Dams Act of 1978 regarding modifications based on new data for safety purposes.
